name: Ramen Simulator 2019 (working title)
description:
!MOUSE RECOMMENDED!

How To Play

Drag ramen ingredients into the bowl in order to recreate ramen made by a better person. If you think you've done the best you can within the time limit, hit the "good enough" button and admit defeat.

Tip: Ingredient rotation doesn't matter! Just put each ingredient where it needs to be.

Controls

  • Press Space to start the game, or restart the game when it's over.
  • Left-click ingredients to drag them into the bowl. Ramen noodles can't be dragged!
  • Left-click within the bowl to add force to ingredients
  • Right-click to preview the ramen you're supposed to copy.
